title: Nashville 3-Year-Old Shoots Self In Hand With Father's Gun
content:
HERMITAGE, TN — A 3-year-old is recovering with non-life-threatening injuries after boy shot himself in the hand with his father's gun Tuesday night.
Police were flagged down on Briley Parkway by someone transporting the child to the hospital. The officers learned the incident took place at the nearby Glastonbury Apartments near Nashville International Airport.
Police entered the apartment and found the gun. The child's father is a licensed security guard with a handgun carry permit.
Neither the child nor his father are being identified at this time.
The police investigation is ongoing and the case will be presented to the district attorney’s to determine if charges should be filed.
The Department of Children’s Services is also investigating.
